43 #include "tapi_iiwa_control.hpp"
44 #include <algorithm>
45 #include <chrono>
46 #include "tapi_iiwa/OpenIGTLStateService.h"
47 
48 #define PI 3.14159265358979323846
49 
50 using namespace std;
51 
52 namespace Tapi
53 {
54 // Constructor/Destructor
55 iiwaControl::iiwaControl(ros::NodeHandle* nh) : nh(nh)
56 {
57  // Set default values
58  firstPose = true;
59  std::fill(angular, angular + sizeof(angular), 0.0);
60  std::fill(linear, linear + sizeof(linear), 0.0);
61 
62  // Create (Tapi compliant) subscribers, publishers and serviceclients
63  tclient = new Tapi::ServiceClient(nh, "iiwa Controller");
64  tpub = new Tapi::Publisher(nh, "iiwa Controller");
65  tsub = new Tapi::Subscriber(nh, "iiwa Controller");
66  iiwaModeClient = tclient->AddFeature<tapi_iiwa::OpenIGTLStateService>("Mode");
67  iiwaPub = tpub->AddFeature<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("Goal Pose to Robot", 1);
68  coefficients[0] =
69  tsub->AddFeature(SubscribeOptionsForTapi(std_msgs::Float64, 1, &iiwaControl::gotAngularX), "Angular X");
70  coefficients[1] =
71  tsub->AddFeature(SubscribeOptionsForTapi(std_msgs::Float64, 1, &iiwaControl::gotAngularY), "Angular Y");
72  coefficients[2] =
73  tsub->AddFeature(SubscribeOptionsForTapi(std_msgs::Float64, 1, &iiwaControl::gotAngularZ), "Angular Z");
74  coefficients[3] =
75  tsub->AddFeature(SubscribeOptionsForTapi(std_msgs::Float64, 1, &iiwaControl::gotLinearX), "Linear X");
76  coefficients[4] =
77  tsub->AddFeature(SubscribeOptionsForTapi(std_msgs::Float64, 1, &iiwaControl::gotLinearY), "Linear Y");
78  coefficients[5] =
79  tsub->AddFeature(SubscribeOptionsForTapi(std_msgs::Float64, 1, &iiwaControl::gotLinearZ), "Linear Z");
80  tsub->AddFeature(SubscribeOptionsForTapi(sensor_msgs::Joy, 1, &iiwaControl::gotJoy), "[Optional] Full Joy Message");
81  tsub->AddFeature(SubscribeOptionsForTapi(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped, 1, &iiwaControl::gotCurrentPose),
82  "Get Current Pose from Robot");
83  posePub[0] = tpub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Float64>("Current X-Position of Flange", 1);
84  posePub[1] = tpub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Float64>("Current Y-Position of Flange", 1);
85  posePub[2] = tpub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Float64>("Current Z-Position of Flange", 1);
86  posePub[3] = tpub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Float64>("Current X-Rotation of Flange", 1);
87  posePub[4] = tpub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Float64>("Current Y-Rotation of Flange", 1);
88  posePub[5] = tpub->AddFeature<std_msgs::Float64>("Current Z-Rotation of Flange", 1);
89 
90  // Start the thread to activate the robot
91  activateThread = new thread(&iiwaControl::activate, this);
92 }
93 
94 iiwaControl::~iiwaControl()
95 {
96  delete tclient;
97  delete tpub;
98  delete tsub;
99  activateThread->join();
100  delete activateThread;
101  sendThread->join();
102  delete sendThread;
103 }
104 
105 // Private member functions
106 void iiwaControl::activate()
107 {
108  while (ros::ok())
109  {
110  this_thread::sleep_for(chrono::milliseconds(50));
111 
112  // Check whether the ServiceClient is connected
113  if (*iiwaModeClient)
114  {
115  // Call the service with a specific message to start movement
116  tapi_iiwa::OpenIGTLStateService msg;
117  msg.request.state = "MoveToPose;rob;";
118  if (!(*iiwaModeClient)->call(msg) || !msg.response.alive)
119  ROS_ERROR("Error when connecting to iiwa or iiwa node");
120  }
121  }
122 }
123 
124 void iiwaControl::gotAngularX(const std_msgs::Float64::ConstPtr& msg)
125 {
126  angular[0] = msg->data * *coefficients[0];
127 }
128 
129 void iiwaControl::gotAngularY(const std_msgs::Float64::ConstPtr& msg)
130 {
131  angular[1] = msg->data * *coefficients[1];
132 }
133 
134 void iiwaControl::gotAngularZ(const std_msgs::Float64::ConstPtr& msg)
135 {
136  angular[2] = msg->data * *coefficients[2];
137 }
138 
139 void iiwaControl::gotCurrentPose(const geometry_msgs::PoseStamped::ConstPtr& msg)
140 {
141  // Check if the pose is valid. If not: return
142  if (msg->pose.position.x == 0 && msg->pose.position.y == 0 && msg->pose.position.z == 0 &&
143  msg->pose.orientation.w == 0 && msg->pose.orientation.x == 0 && msg->pose.orientation.y == 0 &&
144  msg->pose.orientation.z == 0)
145  return;
146 
147  // Save the current position
148  currentPosition[0] = msg->pose.position.x;
149  currentPosition[1] = msg->pose.position.y;
150  currentPosition[2] = msg->pose.position.z;
151  currentRotQuat.setW(msg->pose.orientation.w);
152  currentRotQuat.setX(msg->pose.orientation.x);
153  currentRotQuat.setY(msg->pose.orientation.y);
154  currentRotQuat.setZ(msg->pose.orientation.z);
155 
156  // Calculate the rotation matrice from the quaternion and then get the euler angles in radian
157  tf::Matrix3x3 temp(currentRotQuat);
158  temp.getRPY(currentRotEuler[0], currentRotEuler[1], currentRotEuler[2]);
159 
160  // Publish the current position
161  std_msgs::Float64 pubmsg[6];
162  pubmsg[0].data = currentPosition[0];
163  pubmsg[1].data = currentPosition[1];
164  pubmsg[2].data = currentPosition[2];
165  pubmsg[3].data = currentRotEuler[0];
166  pubmsg[4].data = currentRotEuler[1];
167  pubmsg[5].data = currentRotEuler[2];
168  for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++)
169  posePub[i]->publish(pubmsg[i]);
170 
171  // If this is the first time we get a valid position we take this as the base (starting point) for "controlPosition"
172  // to do an open loop control and start the sendData-thread
173  if (firstPose)
174  {
175  controlPosition[0] = currentPosition[0];
176  controlPosition[1] = currentPosition[1];
177  controlPosition[2] = currentPosition[2];
178  controlRotEuler[0] = currentRotEuler[0];
179  controlRotEuler[1] = currentRotEuler[1];
180  controlRotEuler[2] = currentRotEuler[2];
181  firstPose = false;
182  sendThread = new thread(&iiwaControl::sendData, this);
183  }
184 }
185 
186 void iiwaControl::gotJoy(const sensor_msgs::Joy::ConstPtr& msg)
187 {
188  // Save the data in the right order (maybe only valid for spacenavs? Other devices better connect to the single
189  // "channels"
190  if (msg->axes.size() < 6)
191  return;
192  angular[0] = msg->axes[3];
193  angular[1] = msg->axes[4];
194  angular[2] = msg->axes[5];
195  linear[0] = msg->axes[1];
196  linear[1] = msg->axes[0];
197  linear[2] = msg->axes[2];
198 }
199 
200 void iiwaControl::gotLinearX(const std_msgs::Float64::ConstPtr& msg)
201 {
202  linear[0] = msg->data * *coefficients[3];
203 }
204 
205 void iiwaControl::gotLinearY(const std_msgs::Float64::ConstPtr& msg)
206 {
207  linear[1] = msg->data * *coefficients[4];
208 }
209 
210 void iiwaControl::gotLinearZ(const std_msgs::Float64::ConstPtr& msg)
211 {
212  linear[2] = msg->data * *coefficients[5];
213 }
214 
215 void iiwaControl::sendData()
216 {
217  // Calculate the factors based on the given speeds
218  unsigned int runsPerSecond = 20;
219  unsigned int waitTime = 1000 / runsPerSecond;
220  double speed_cm_per_s = 10.0;
221  double speedFactor = speed_cm_per_s / 100 / runsPerSecond;
222  double degree_per_s = 45.0 * PI / 180.0;
223  double angleFactor = degree_per_s / runsPerSecond;
224 
225  while (ros::ok())
226  {
227  this_thread::sleep_for(chrono::milliseconds(waitTime));
228 
229  // Wait for the first valid current robot position to make relative movements to it
230  if (!firstPose)
231  {
232  controlPosition[0] = controlPosition[0] + linear[0] * speedFactor;
233  controlPosition[1] = controlPosition[1] + linear[1] * speedFactor;
234  controlPosition[2] = controlPosition[2] + linear[2] * speedFactor;
235  controlRotEuler[0] = controlRotEuler[0] + angular[0] * angleFactor;
236  controlRotEuler[1] = controlRotEuler[1] + angular[1] * angleFactor;
237  controlRotEuler[2] = controlRotEuler[2] + angular[2] * angleFactor;
238 
239  // Now generate a geometry message from the calculated positions
240  header.seq++;
241  header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
242  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped msg;
243  msg.header.seq = header.seq;
244  msg.header.stamp = header.stamp;
245  msg.pose.position.x = controlPosition[0];
246  msg.pose.position.y = controlPosition[1];
247  msg.pose.position.z = controlPosition[2];
248  // We need quaternions for the robot position, so calculate them from the euler angles
249  tf::Quaternion quat = tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(controlRotEuler[0], controlRotEuler[1], controlRotEuler[2]);
250  msg.pose.orientation.w = quat.getW();
251  msg.pose.orientation.x = quat.getX();
252  msg.pose.orientation.y = quat.getY();
253  msg.pose.orientation.z = quat.getZ();
254  iiwaPub->publish(msg);
255  }
256  }
257 }
258 }
